objects.text:
• Robust Steel Construction
• High Load Capacity
• Safety-Compliant Design
• Low Maintenance System

LIMITED TIME OFFER
Perfect for warehouses & multi-level facilities

product_details.name: Heavy-Duty Hydraulic Goods Lift | Industrial Vertical Cargo Elevator
product_details.description:
• Robust steel frame construction for maximum durability and stability
• Safety-compliant platform with hazard warning stripes
• Vertical guide rails ensure smooth and precise lifting operation
• Customizable platform dimensions to suit your space requirements
• Perfect for warehouses, factories, and multi-level facilities
• High load capacity for efficient material handling
• Emergency stop and safety features built-in
• Space-efficient design maximizes vertical transport
• Low maintenance requirements with reliable hydraulic system
• Easy installation and integration into existing facilities

banner_details:
The banner features a bold, industrial-style design promoting a hydraulic lift product. It carries a strong geometric layout with diagonal layered backgrounds adding depth and dynamics. The primary headline text layers "heading_1" and "heading_2" are large, uppercase, and white, ensuring maximum attention against the navy-blue backdrop. The subheading "subheading" appears in a techno-style yellow typeface, matched by a sleek horizontal divider ("decorative_line"). The feature list in "description" highlights product qualities in concise bullet points. A vibrant price tag on "price" stands out in oversized yellow font. The "cta" call-to-action text is centered over a striking orange-red rectangle ("cta_background"). "product_image" anchors the right side visually, and the bottom area features "tagline" as a complementary, readable note.

**Color Palette**:
- Navy Blue (#0D3B66)
- Warm Yellow (#F4D35E)
- Vibrant Orange (#F95738)
- White (#FFFFFF)
- Deep Red Overlay (approximate #7F1D1D with 0.6 opacity)
product_color: The product image showcases a vertical goods lift with a bold and industrial aesthetic. Dominated by a striking **industrial orange** (#D35400), the frame provides visual impact and brand visibility. The platform area contrasts with **matte black** (#2C3E50), giving a grounded, durable appearance. A caution strip at the base uses **bright yellow** (#F1C40F) and black for safety emphasis, drawing attention to potential hazard zones. Colors are distinctly separated yet harmonized through saturation and purpose, promoting both usability and warning. For an advertisement banner, pairing **rich orange**, **dark gray**, **caution yellow**, and **clean white** (#FFFFFF) will reinforce structure, safety, and clarity.
